articles.author: Nick Bonyhady
articles.title: Hope, but no guarantee, from government on first jabs by year’s end - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Trade Minister Dan Tehan will make a case to European leaders for greater global access to vaccines as the EU restricts exports of doses.
articles.content: The Morrison government still hopes to give every adult Australian their first COVID-19 vaccine dose by the end of the year as Labor pushes for the Prime Minister to guarantee that timeline despite n… [+1855 chars]

articles.title: Canon announces the CJ17ex6.2B – a 4K-capable BCTV lens with wide focal length range - Guardian

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: How worried should we be about links of blood clots to AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine? - CNA
articles.description: ZURICH: Europe's drug regulator on Wednesday (Apr 7) said it had found a possible link between AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine and very rare blood clots in adults who received the shot. Britain recommended people under 30 get an alternative COVID-19 vaccine if…
